plot_watershed

plot_watershed.Rd

plot_watershed

plot_watershed(
  data_dir,
  watersheds_file_path = "water/CWM_v2_2/World_Watershed8.shp",
  crop_file_path = "land/2016_90m_cdls/cdl_lowres_usa.img",
  crop_attributes = "land/2016_90m_cdls/cdl_lowres_usa.img.vat.dbf",
  powerplants_file_path = "water/UCS-EW3-Energy-Water-Database.xlsx",
  conus_file_path = "misc/states_21basic/states.shp",
  dams_file_path = "water/nabd_fish_barriers_2012/nabd_fish_barriers_2012.shp",
  nlud_file_path = "land/usa_nlud_raster.tif",
  citypoint_file_path = "water/CWM_v2_2/City_Centroid.shp",
  city
)

Arguments

data_dir

root directory for the spatial data ("/pic/projects/im3/teleconnections/data/")
watersheds_file_path

path of watersheds shapefile within data_dir
crop_file_path

path of CDL img file
powerplants_file_path

path of power plants data file
conus_file_path

path of CONUS state boundaries shape file
city

character. City to be analysed in the format "City | STATE" (e.g., "Phoenix | AZ")
landcover_file_path

path of NLCD landcover data file

Details

plots the watersheds and relevant features for a chosen city
